p: Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss
In the District Court, Fourth Judicial District holding terms at Spokane Falls.
The Territory of Washington vs. Ray Raymond

I, W.S. Humphrey being duly sworn on my oath depose and say that I am now and for the past five years have been a resident of the precinct of Rockford in Spokane County Washington Territory. That I have had casual knowledge that there was such a case as that above names now since the homicide out of which it grew. That I am well acquainted with the people residing in said Rockford precinct, and have personal acquaintance with the greater share of them.

That I am engaged
in the recantible business in said precinct and at the town of Rockford and have opportunity to hear the opinions and sentiments of the people of said precinct expressed and in a general way known the same. That I have now hear any expressions of hostility or of prejudice afainst the said defendant Ray Raymond by the residents of said precinct. That if there was prejudice and ill will stating against her there I should have been most aware to have heard it. That from my best information the alleged facts relating to the homicide out of which said action grew, all not generally known at said precinct known to the people of said precinct and that they generally have not formed an opinion as to the guilt or innocence of said defendant, and that the people of said precinct
are not prejudiced against said Ray Raymond in said action.

Applicant further saith that there are about eight hundred people living in said Rockford precinct and that applicant verily believes that a large number of good unprejudiced and legally qualified jurors can be summoned and secured in said precinct to serve as jurors in said action. And further applicant saith not.
Subsribed and sworn to before me this 10th day of December A.D. 1886
Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss

I Thomas Botham being duly sworn on my oath do depose and say that I am now and for the past four years have been a resident of the precinct of Rockford
in Spokane County Washington Territory. That I have heard & read the foregoing affidavit of W.S. Humphrey and know the conclusion thing. That the facts therein stated are true as I verily believe.
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 10th day of December A.D. 1886.
